articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Elon Musk’s statements could be ‘deepfakes’, Tesla defence lawyers tell court - The Guardian
articles.description: Judge in Autopilot death case says defence argument ‘deeply troubling’ and wants Tesla CEO interviewed under oath on safety claims
articles.content: A California judge has tentatively ordered Elon Musk to be interviewed under oath about whether he made certain statements regarding the capabilities of Teslas Autopilot features after the company qu… [+2183 chars]

articles.author: Georgina Torbet
articles.title: SpaceX's Starship blew up after launch — it also caused “catastrophic” damage on the ground - The Verge
articles.description: The launch of SpaceX’s Starship has been considered a success despite the subsequent explosion of the rocket. But the damage to the launch pad and the surrounding environmental fallout exceeded most people’s expectations.
articles.content:
The damage to the launch pad went far beyond what experts were expecting. And nearby residents are left dealing with the environmental fallout. 
ByGeorgina Torbet
Apr 26, 2023, 7:01 PM UTC|Comments… [+8497 chars]
